name: @apigrate/quickbooks
description: NodeJS API Connector for the Intuit QuickBooks API.

scripts.test-package-aws: sam package cloudformation deploy --profile myprofile  --template-file ./templates/intuit-auth-api.yaml --output-template-file pkg-intuitauth.yaml --s3-bucket mybucketname
scripts.test-deploy-aws: aws cloudformation deploy --profile myprofile  --template-file pkg-intuitauth.yaml --stack-name intuitauth

author: Derek Gau
